name: The Bund
description: Iconic waterfront area with colonial-era buildings and stunning skyline views.
location: The Bund, Shanghai, China

name: Yu Garden
description: Classical Chinese garden with pavilions, rockeries, and ponds dating back to the Ming Dynasty.
location: 218 Anren St, Huangpu District, Shanghai, China

name: Shanghai Tower
description: The tallest building in China with an observation deck offering panoramic views of the city.
location: 501 Yincheng Middle Rd, Lujiazui, Pudong, Shanghai, China

name: Nanjing Road
description: Famous shopping street with a mix of traditional stores and modern malls.
location: Nanjing Rd, Shanghai, China

name: Jade Buddha Temple
description: Buddhist temple known for its two jade Buddha statues and serene atmosphere.
location: 170 Anyuan Rd, Jing'an District, Shanghai, China

name: Shanghai Museum
description: World-class museum showcasing ancient Chinese art, including ceramics, paintings, and calligraphy.
location: 201 Renmin Ave, People's Square, Shanghai, China

name: Xintiandi
description: Trendy area with restored Shikumen houses now serving as cafes, restaurants, and shops.
location: Xintiandi, Huangpu District, Shanghai, China

name: Oriental Pearl Tower
description: Futuristic TV tower with observation decks and a revolving restaurant.
location: 1 Century Ave, Lujiazui, Pudong, Shanghai, China

name: Tianzifang
description: Artistic enclave with narrow alleys filled with galleries, boutiques, and eateries.
location: Tianzifang, Huangpu District, Shanghai, China

name: Shanghai Disneyland
description: Large theme park featuring Disney-themed rides, shows, and attractions.
location: Pudong, Shanghai, China

name: Fuxing Park
description: Beautiful park with French-style gardens, a lake, and recreational areas.
location: 516 Fuxing Middle Rd, Huangpu District, Shanghai, China

name: Shanghai Science and Technology Museum
description: Interactive museum with exhibits on science, technology, and natural history.
location: 2000 Century Ave, Pudong, Shanghai, China

name: Longhua Temple
description: Ancient Buddhist temple complex with beautiful architecture and gardens.
location: 2853 Longhua Rd, Xuhui District, Shanghai, China

name: People's Square
description: Central public square surrounded by museums, theaters, and government buildings.
location: People's Square, Huangpu District, Shanghai, China

name: Shanghai Circus World
description: Venue offering spectacular circus performances featuring acrobatics and stunts.
location: 2266 Gonghexin Rd, Jing'an District, Shanghai, China

name: Zhujiajiao Water Town
description: Ancient water town with canals, traditional architecture, and charming streets.
location: Zhujiajiao, Qingpu District, Shanghai, China

name: Shanghai Botanical Garden
description: Expansive garden featuring diverse plant species, themed gardens, and greenhouses.
location: 1111 Longwu Rd, Xuhui District, Shanghai, China

name: M50 Creative Park
description: Contemporary art district with galleries, studios, and cafes in a former industrial area.
location: 50 Moganshan Rd, Putuo District, Shanghai, China

name: Shanghai Ocean Aquarium
description: Large aquarium featuring marine life from around the world and underwater tunnels.
location: 1388 Lujiazui Ring Rd, Pudong, Shanghai, China

name: Century Park
description: Spacious urban park with lakes, gardens, and recreational facilities.
location: No. 1001 Jinxiu Rd, Pudong, Shanghai, China

name: Shanghai Grand Theatre
description: Modern performing arts venue hosting operas, ballets, and concerts.
location: 300 Renmin Ave, People's Square, Shanghai, China
